text: Aey eman walo! Tum Allah key madadgar bann jao. Jiss tarah hazrat marium kay betay hazrat essa ney hawariyon say farmaya kay kaun hai jo Allah ki raah mein mera madadgar baney? Hawariyon ney kaha hum Allah ki raah mein madadgar hain pus bani israeel mein say aik jamat to eman laee aur aik jamat ney kufur kiya tum hum ney mominon ki unn kay dushman kay muqabley mein madad ki pus woh ghalib aagaye
